quote: This is why you don’t bring back fallen warriors, sooner or later they’re going to see everything they fought for’s turned to shit.
title: Cyberpunk 2077

quote: Actually, I wasn't gonna pay you at all.
title: Cyberpunk 2077

quote: Eh, you get used to it. I just gotta be careful not to pull the pin when I wanna pick my nose.
title: Cyberpunk 2077

quote: Once upon a time, people were talking to graves and nobody batted an eyelid, right?
title: Cyberpunk 2077

quote: Give yourself time. Ideas'll come. Life'll shake you, roll you, maybe embrace you. The music'll find you.
title: Cyberpunk 2077

quote: Now, as that ol' Greek dawg says, life's a banquet - so don't go thirsty, but don't get drunk, either.
title: Cyberpunk 2077

quote: The city of dreams. I'd gladly kick the balls off the idiot who thought that one up.
title: Cyberpunk 2077

quote: Swap meat for chrome, live a BD fantasy, whatever, but at the end of it all, it's the code you live by that defines who you are.
title: Cyberpunk 2077

quote: Survival requires perfection.
title: Horizon Zero Dawn

quote: The strength to stand alone, Aloy, is the strength to make a stand. To serve a purpose greater than yourself. That is the lesson you must learn.
title: Horizon Zero Dawn

quote: Being smart will count for nothing if you don’t make the world better.
title: Horizon Zero Dawn

quote: People die all the time. Now keep going, and find something interesting.
title: Horizon Zero Dawn

quote: When we teach the young to walk on shifting ice we say: the secret is taking one step, then the next.
title: Horizon Zero Dawn

quote: Try not to forget about me while you're out there changing the world.
title: Horizon Zero Dawn

quote: Change will not come in a single sunrise.
title: Horizon Zero Dawn

quote: What happened to dreams and honor?

quote: SOLDIER 2nd class Zack, on the job!

quote: Sephiroth! Have you completely lost your mind?!

quote: Dammit, you're not the only Hero!

quote: Embrace your dreams, and... whatever happens, protect your honor... as SOLDIER!

quote: Why is everyone...always pushing things on me?

quote: Those wings, I want them too.

quote: That girl, she said that the sky frightened her, that looks so liberating.

quote: Hey, would you say I became a hero?

quote: Boy oh boy, the price of freedom is steep.

quote: Sorry if your sword got any wear, tear or rust on it.

quote: Don't sweat it. If I can do it, you can, too.

quote: That girl, she said that the sky frightened her, that looks so liberating.
title: Final Fantasy Crisis Core

quote: Hey, Zack? You know, I've never seen you use that.

quote: I'm... your living... legacy.

quote: I have twenty-three tiny wishes, but you probably won't remember them all, so I put them all together into one... I'd like to spend more time with you.
title: Final Fantasy Crisis Core
